const latestTransactions=new Map();data.forEach(item=>{const existingItem=latestTransactions.get(item.teamName);if(!existingItem||new Date(item.dateTime)>new Date(existingItem.dateTime)){latestTransactions.set(item.teamName,item);}});// Convert map back to array and sort by amountAfter in descending order
return Array.from(latestTransactions.values()).sort((a,b)=>b.amountAfter-a.amountAfter);}else{// Filter data for the selected team and sort by dateTime in descending order
return data.filter(item=>item.teamName===selectedTeam).sort((a,b)=>new Date(b.dateTime)-new Date(a.dateTime));}};const
